_source.short_desc: The best law practice management software for small law firms. When it's time to get serious about your firm, it's time for Smokeball.
_source.long_desc: Smokeball is the only cloud-based legal case management software that also runs from your desktop. Manage all of your matters with collaborative case management; customize your commonly used forms with a single click in document automation; pull up-to-date local forms from our library of 20,000+ court documents; track your billable hours across programs without a single click; bill, e-file, and collect all in one place. Try Smokeball law manager software and see all of its benefits for yourself!
_source.pricing_details: Smokeball offers different solutions depending on your needs, from cloud-based billing to complete firm management.
_source.target_audience: Small firms based in the United States that practice in: Family Law, Conveyancing, Leasing, Litigation, Wills & Estates, Business Sale & Purchase, Franchise, Employment and Criminal Law.

Access and manage your work in one central system - with matters, contacts, billing, and everything you need in one place. Schedule a live demo to learn more.

related_products.short_desc: Mobile friendly and secure legal software that's easy to learn and use. Save time. Grow your firm. Go paperless. Work from anywhere.
related_products.features: PracticePanther is the top rated law practice management software on Capterra! Spend less time managing your firm and more time making money. Try it free, no credit card needed.

related_products.short_desc: MyCase is a top-rated, complete law practice management solution with all the tools firms need to run a better practice, from anywhere.
related_products.features: MyCase is a top-rated, end-to-end law practice management solution that helps firms run efficiently from anywhere, provide an exceptional client experience, and easily track firm performance. Streamline day-to-day firm processes in one, easy to adopt solution -- lead tracking, client intake, case management, eSignature, billing, payments and more. Start your free trial (no credit card required) today!

related_products.short_desc: AbacusLaw is a turn-key, fully integrated Case Management Solution for firms of all sizes, in all practice areas and jurisdictions.
related_products.features: AbacusLaw is a turn-key, fully integrated law practice management solution. Founded in 1983, AbacusLaw works for firms of any size in every industry. Features include rules-based calendaring, document / form automation, matter management, conflict checking, contact management, document and email management, time tracking, billing, balance, accounting, trust accounting and more. AbacusLaw is also available in our private cloud for a complete disaster-proof solution.

related_products.short_desc: CosmoLex is the only cloud-based, total practice management, billing, and accounting system (no QuickBooks? required).
related_products.features: Thousands of law firms have switched to CosmoLex - the only cloud-based, law practice management software with built-in, compliant legal accounting (no QuickBooks needed). CosmoLex eliminates the struggle of juggling separate systems for law practice management, billing, and accounting. LawPay credit card processing is also built-in with no fixed monthly fee. Simply log into CosmoLex Cloud - anytime, anywhere - to get everything you need to run your entire law practice. Try free today!

related_products.short_desc: The best CRM for lawyers. It helps manage Contacts, Projects, and Timesheets. It's great because it sits right within your Outlook.

Organize emails and meetings automatically by projects, automate repetitive tasks with workflow, track your time, customize forms, and much more.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Court Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Court Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Court Management software provides solutions for case management including docketing, workflow, calendar, concise case summaries, judicial assignments, and more. Court Management software is related to Legal Case Management software, Legal Document Management software, Law Practice Management software, and Legal Billing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Legal Billing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Legal Billing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Legal Billing software automates time tracking, billing, calendaring and accounting for law practices. These applications facilitate legal-style hourly billing and recording of case-related expenses. Many Legal Billing solutions also feature integration for a broad range of case and workflow management tools as well as accounting and payroll features across multiple office locations. Legal Billing software is related to Law Practice Management software, Professional Services Automation software and Time and Expense software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Legal Calendar software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Legal Calendar tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Legal Calendar software helps attorneys to manage their schedules. These applications allow users to schedule events and appointments, set deadline reminders and notifies of any conflicts. Legal Calendar software is related to Court Management software, Law Practice Management software, Legal Billing software and Legal Case Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Legal Case Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Legal Case Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Legal Case Management software coordinates documents, scheduling, conflicts, contacts, and reporting associated with legal cases. These applications enable an integrated solution to automate case management, client history tracking, and contracts as well as billing and accounting. Legal Case Management solutions also often include database management, electronic discovery, and automatic document template editing features, enabling organizations to manage, distribute, and update key case-related data. Legal Case Management software is related to Legal Document Management software, Law Practice Management software and Legal Billing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Legal Document Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Legal Document Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Legal Document Management software allows legal professionals to organize and quickly access electronically-stored legal documents. Scanning, imaging, and merging allow these documents to be included in a database that is searchable and sortable in any number of ways. This type of software can also allow for transcript and transcription management. Legal Document Management software is related to Document Management software, Legal Case Management software, Law Practice Management software, and Court Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Legal Research software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Legal Research tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Legal Research software and services aggregate court judgements, legislation, regulations and case law from a variety of sources as well as provide tools for automating legislation discovery and analysis.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Trust Accounting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Trust Accounting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Trust Accounting software allows administrators to manage trusts, estates and investment portfolios. Trust Accounting solutions can be used by bank trust departments, accountants, law firms, non-profit organizations and independent trust companies and helps to keep administrators in compliance with all applicable laws and regulations. Trust Accounting software is related to Accounting software, Fund Accounting software, Law Practice Management software, Investment Management software and Legal Billing software.

Automate document creation and approvals to increase efficiency and minimize error, share and collaborate on documents in real-time, and maximize security by centralizing them in one place. related_products.short_desc: Wrike is a collaboration software used for document management with visual proofing, real-time collaboration, and Kanban boards.
related_products.features: Wrike is a work management software trusted by 20,000+ companies worldwide. Streamline your document management with cloud-based, in-context file storage. Share documents within custom request forms and tasks, shorten your approval cycles with visual proofing, and quickly tag teammates for any file requests. Accelerate your delivery with Wrike's 400+ integrations, including other document management software. Documents are easy-to-find and task discussions and updates can be seen in seconds.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Content Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Content Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Content Management (CMS) software (CMS) is used for managing digital content across the enterprise and often refers specifically to managing websites and editing web content. There are many different kinds of CMS solutions on the market including both open-source and proprietary solutions. Many Content Management solutions allow the creation, modification and removal of content from the web site without extended knowledge of HTML or the expertise of a webmaster. Content Management software is related to Catalog Management software and Portal software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Digital Asset Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Digital Asset Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Digital Asset Management software automates the management of images and other non-textual materials. Digital Asset Management applications enable powerful, flexible solutions for developing, organizing, and distributing digital assets across multiple office locations and business sectors. These solutions ensure optimal usage for an organization's rich media assets such as advertising pieces, product images, sales collateral, audio, and video files. Digital Asset Management software is related to Document Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Entity Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Entity Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Entity Management software and related services enable organizations to maintain a searchable and easily accessible repository of records of one or more legal formations under their control.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Forms Automation software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Forms Automation tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Forms Automation software gives companies the ability to streamline document workflows. These solutions optimize document creation, printing, faxing, merging, security, and inbound/outbound document traffic. Companies can create and manage nearly any kind of document, from invoices to incident reports, and can easily track collected information. Forms Automation software is relevant to most industries and is related to Business Process Management software, Content Management software, Contract Management software, and Document Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top IT Asset Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of IT Asset Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: IT Asset Management software provides enterprise wide inventory and life cycle management of software and hardware assets. This can include asset maintenance history, user permissions, acquisition budget forecasting, and software license compliance. This type of software enables IT managers to improve cost control and accurately track IT's business value throughout the organization. IT Asset Management software is related to Compliance software, License Management software, and IT Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Knowledge Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Knowledge Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Knowledge Management software offers ways to optimize the utility of intellectual capital and intangible assets by capturing, preserving and organizing institutional knowledge in a measurable format. Knowledge Management solutions allow successful strategies to be transferred and replicated throughout an organization. Implementation can be inwardly focused on faster learning, new knowledge creation, and innovation or directed outwardly, providing a self-guided service path for customers. Knowledge Management software is related to Business Intelligence software and Document Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Legal Document Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Legal Document Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Legal Document Management software allows legal professionals to organize and quickly access electronically-stored legal documents. Scanning, imaging, and merging allow these documents to be included in a database that is searchable and sortable in any number of ways. This type of software can also allow for transcript and transcription management. Legal Document Management software is related to Document Management software, Legal Case Management software, Law Practice Management software, and Court Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Proposal Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Proposal Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Proposal Management software helps companies manage the proposal and RFP process. Bidders may quickly create strong business proposals and responses to RFPs that are tailored to the needs of each proposal. This software is helpful in automating the more cumbersome aspects of proposal writing while maintaining a detailed and professional-looking document. Some Proposal Management software is also a good fit for companies that are soliciting proposals. In this case, the software helps to organize and evaluate various aspects of multiple proposals at once. Proposal Management software is related to Quoting software, Contract Management software, and Professional Services Automation software.
